mapper.select: select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.middlecateCode ,g.gdsStock , g.gdsDes , g.gdsImg , g.gdsDate , g.gdsImg , g.gdsThumbImg , m.middlecateName , c.cateCode , c.cateName from tbl_goods g inner join middle_category m on g.middlecateCode =m.middlecateCode inner join goods_category c on m.cateCode =c.cateCode where g.middlecateCode =#{middlecateCode}

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.middlecateCode ,g.gdsStock , g.gdsDes , g.gdsImg , g.gdsDate , g.gdsImg , g.gdsThumbImg , m.middlecateName , c.cateCode , c.cateName from tbl_goods g inner join middle_category m on g.middlecateCode =m.middlecateCode inner join goods_category c on m.cateCode =c.cateCode where c.cateCode =#{cateCode}

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.middlecateCode ,g.gdsStock , g.gdsDes , g.gdsImg , g.gdsDate , g.gdsImg , g.gdsThumbImg , m.middlecateName , c.cateCode , c.cateName from tbl_goods g inner join middle_category m on g.middlecateCode =m.middlecateCode inner join goods_category c on m.cateCode =c.cateCode where g.middlecateCode =#{middlecateCode}
select gdsNum,gdsName,middlecateCode,gdsPrice,gdsStock,gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate,gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods where gdsNum=#{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart(cartNum, id, gdsNum, cartStock) values(tbl_cart_seq.nextval,#{id},#{gdsNum},#{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.id, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_details(orderDetailsNum, orderId, gdsNum, cartStock) select tbl_order_details_seq.nextval, #{orderId}, gdsNum, cartStock from tbl_cart
mapper.select: select orderId, id, orderRec, addr1, addr2, addr3,orderPhon,amount,orderDate from tbl_order where id =#{id}

select o.orderId, o.id, o.orderRec, o.addr1, o.addr2, o.addr3, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.id = #{id} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
